Question: When **** was six months old his father was appointed to a more prosperous parish in Laufen.
Hints: This person's work on himself and his patients convinced him that life has a spiritual purpose beyond material goals.
In 1903, this person married Emma Rauschenbach, who came from a wealthy family in Switzerland.
In 1908, this person became an editor of the newly founded Yearbook for Psychoanalytical and Psychopathological Research.
